20110106222837.000|20110106222842.000|CC1|        the leading part.       
20110106222842.000|20110106222843.000|CC1|   ADVAIR is clinically proven  
20110106222843.000|20110106222843.000|CC1|  to help significantly improve 
20110106222843.000|20110106222846.000|CC1|         lung function.         
20110106222846.000|20110106222848.000|CC1|  Unlike most COPD medications, 
20110106222848.000|20110106222848.000|CC1|         ADVAIR contains        
20110106222848.000|20110106222851.000|CC1|    both an anti-inflammatory   
20110106222851.000|20110106222851.000|CC1|        and a long-acting       
20110106222851.000|20110106222853.000|CC1|         bronchodilator,        
20110106222853.000|20110106222854.000|CC1|        working together        
20110106222854.000|20110106222854.000|CC1|         to help improve        
20110106222854.000|20110106222856.000|CC1|   your lung function all day.  
20110106222856.000|20110106222856.000|CC1|      ADVAIR won't replace      
20110106222856.000|20110106222859.000|CC1|      fast-acting inhalers      
20110106222859.000|20110106222900.000|CC1|       for sudden symptoms      
20110106222900.000|20110106222900.000|CC1|     and should not be used     
20110106222900.000|20110106222902.000|CC1|     more than twice a day.     
20110106222902.000|20110106222902.000|CC1|        People with COPD        
20110106222902.000|20110106222904.000|CC1|          taking ADVAIR         
20110106222904.000|20110106222904.000|CC1|        may have a higher       
20110106222904.000|20110106222906.000|CC1|      chance of pneumonia.      
20110106222906.000|20110106222906.000|CC1|    ADVAIR may increase your    
20110106222906.000|20110106222909.000|CC1|      risk of osteoporosis

20110106222910.000|20110106222913.000|CC1|        a heart condition

20110106222916.000|20110106222917.000|CC1|      difficulty breathing,
